triageFlags.title: Credit Report Missing
triageFlags.description: Credit report is not available for this proposal.
triageFlags.recommendation: Reject the proposal until a valid credit report is provided for evaluation.
triageFlags.reasoning: Without a credit report, a comprehensive credit risk assessment cannot be conducted. This violates standard underwriting policy, which mandates a credit report for all applications.
